data.title: Electronic Arts Acquires Maxis Software
data.meta_description: On June 4, 1997, Electronic Arts acquired digital media company Maxis Software for 125M USD
data.text: Electronic Arts is a producer of video games. Electronic Arts develops and delivers games, content and online services for Internet-connected consoles, mobile devices and personal computers. Electronic Arts was founded in 1982 and is based in Redwood City, California.
